main event: A sighting of 8-10 faint red lights in the sky over New Carlisle, Ohio on March 12, 1964.
interesting points: The lights were observed for a duration of 5-10 minutes., The lights were described as bright and faint red., The witness reported the object appeared to change brightness., The witness stated the object disappeared below the horizon., A local resident, James Stempfaul, was present during the sighting.
witness description: Male, age 25, reported the sighting to the Air Force.
